name: Anchovy & Olive Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 115g mozzarella cheese, drained, and cut into 12 thin slices
60g can anchovies in olive oil, drained and cut in half lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the grill on its highest setting and position the rack 10cm from the heat. Toast the bread until golden on both sides. Rub 1 side with the cut side of the garlic. Brush the same side of each slice with oil.

Spread each bruschetta with 2 tsp tomato sauce and season with salt and pepper. Put a slice of mozzarella on each, sprinkle with herbs and top with olive slices and 2 pieces of anchovy in a criss-cross pattern.
Grill the bruschetta for 2-3 minutes, or until the mozzarella has melted and is bubbling. Serve hot with chilled prosecco or cold beer.
